title: Rando[m] ConverZations: Nick and Julian on The Spirits of the Age
description:
Nick works with Julian to breakdown his ideas about the Zeitgeist.
Don't know what that is?  Check out this converZation and also read what Julian has to say about it here:

https://coffeewithkierkgaard.home.blog/2019/10/06/the-ethos-of-efficiency/
